fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Open during the day.
- Close during the day.
- While you are open, invite someone in at night. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While you are open, players who visit you will not perform their night ability and instead enter you. This does not apply to attacking roles. Protective roles will protect you as they enter you.
- While you are closed, all players that are within you are granted Powerful defense, however they may only visit your direct living neighbors.
- You will know all players within you at all times.
- Your day abilities process at the end of the day.
- Players are informed if they are within you and, at the start of the night, if you are open or closed. If you are open, then the player may target anyone that isn't you or their direct living neighbor.
- Inviting someone in redirects them to you and only works if you are open.
